content.prompt: In the final paragraph, the author concludes her argument by

choices.label: proposing that femininity be reimagined as an artistic pursuit rather than a set of rules
acknowledging that not everyone enjoys the privilege of acting feminine
highlighting the context in which women may choose to embrace femininityâ€™s restrictions
lamenting the way that femininity encourages rivalries among women

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
